TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit ClaimsAuthorizationManager extends System.Object implements class System.IdentityModel.Configuration.ICustomIdentityConfiguration

summary.span: 定义身份验证管理器的基本实现。

span.span: Defines the base implementation for a claims authorization manager.

remarks.format:
## Remarks 类提供的声明授权管理器的基实现。The class provides the base implementation for a claims authorization manager. 在以下两个方案，可以使用声明授权管理器：A claims authorization manager can be used in the following two scenarios: - 在基于 web 的应用程序和服务，声明授权管理器可以添加到处理管道，以提供一个扩展点，从中可以授权对应用程序代码之前的传入声明的值根据资源的访问实际实现请求的资源调用的。In web-based applications and services, a claims authorization manager can be added to the processing pipeline to provide an extensibility point from which you can authorize access to a resource according to the value of incoming claims before the application code that actually implements the requested resource is called. - 当你使用类或类执行命令性或声明性的基于声明的访问将检查在代码中，为你的应用程序配置的声明授权管理器由执行系统调用检查。When you use the class or the class to perform either imperative or declarative claims-based access checks in your code, the claims authorization manager that is configured for your application is called by the system to perform the check. 可以在基于 web 的应用程序和桌面应用程序中执行基于声明的访问检查。Claims-based access checks can be performed in both web-based applications and desktop applications. 由提供的默认实现类授权提供每个声明的访问; 但是，您可以从此类派生，然后重写方法以提供您自己的授权逻辑。The default implementation provided by the class authorizes access for each claim presented; however, you can derive from this class and override the method to provide your own authorization logic. 使用声明授权管理器是可选的。The use of a claims authorization manager is optional. 你可以配置应用程序使用声明授权管理器以编程方式通过使用类或以声明方式，通过指定[ <claimsAuthorizationManager> ](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/windows-identity-foundation/claimsauthorizationmanager.md)元素，它是子元素的[ <identityConfiguration> ](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/windows-identity-foundation/identityconfiguration.md)应用程序配置文件中的元素。You can configure your application to use a claims authorization manager either programmatically by using the class or declaratively, by specifying the [<claimsAuthorizationManager>](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/windows-identity-foundation/claimsauthorizationmanager.md) element, which is a child element of the [<identityConfiguration>](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/windows-identity-foundation/identityconfiguration.md) element in your application configuration file. 如果你的应用程序是网站或 web 应用程序在 Internet 信息服务 (IIS) 承载，还必须添加ASP.NET HTTP 模块集合中。If your application is a web site or a web application hosted in Internet Information Services (IIS), you must also add the in the ASP.NET HTTP Modules collection. > [!IMPORTANT] > 当你使用类或类，用于执行访问检查的声明授权管理器是在下的标识配置中指定的一个属性。When you use the class or the class, the claims authorization manager that is used to perform the access check is the one that is specified in the identity configuration under the property. 在配置文件中，它是``从默认值引用的部分``元素。In a configuration file, it is the `` section that is referenced from the default `` element. 这适用于 Windows Communication Foundation (WCF) 服务和桌面应用程序甚至。This is true even for Windows Communication Foundation (WCF) services and desktop applications. 基类不采用任何附加配置; 但是，你可以重写在派生类中以提供从子元素的声明授权管理器的初始化``。The base class does not take any additional configuration; however, you can override the in derived classes to provide initialization of your claims authorization manager from child elements of the ``. 典型情况是要使用这些子元素来指定这些扩展名决定了哪些声明类型和值，才能访问其资源授权策略。The typical scenario is to use these child elements to specify authorization policies which determine which claim types and values are required in order to gain access to which resource. 这不是硬要求，不过你可以自由地定义所需的使用情况，语法有你的实施有关的意义。This is not a hard requirement, though you are free to define whatever usage and syntax make sense for your implementation. ## Examples 在中使用的代码示例主题，将从`Claims Based Authorization`示例。The code examples that are used in the topics are taken from the `Claims Based Authorization` sample. 此示例提供的自定义声明授权管理器，可以授权基于策略在配置中指定的主题。This sample provides a custom claims authorization manager that can authorize subjects based on a policy that is specified in configuration. 自定义声明授权管理器包括三个基本组件： 派生自该类实现管理器中，`ResourceAction`对资源和操作的类和策略读取器读取，并编译为的策略配置文件中指定。The custom claims authorization manager consists of three basic components: a class derived from that implements the manager, the `ResourceAction` class that pairs a resource and an action, and a policy reader that reads and compiles policy that is specified in the configuration file. 此编译的策略可能然后声明授权管理器用于评估来为对资源的访问授权的主体。This compiled policy can then be used by the claims authorization manager to evaluate a principal in order to authorize access to resources. 不是所有元素都均出现由于篇幅所限。Not all elements are shown for the sake of brevity. 有关此示例，并提供其他示例的 WIF 和有关从哪里下载它们，请参阅[WIF 代码示例索引](~/docs/framework/security/wif-code-sample-index.md)。For information about this sample and other samples available for WIF and about where to download them, see [WIF Code Sample Index](~/docs/framework/security/wif-code-sample-index.md). 下面的代码演示自定义声明授权管理器的实现。The following code shows the implementation of the custom claims authorization manager. 方法读取并使用策略读取器帮助程序类 （未显示） 来编译来自配置的策略和方法授予或拒绝基于此策略的访问。The method reads and compiles the policy from configuration by using the policy reader helper class (not shown) and the method grants or denies access based on this policy. [!code-csharp[WifClaimsBasedAuthorization#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Misc/wifclaimsbasedauthorization/cs/claimsauthorizationlibrary/myclaimsauthorizationmanager.cs#2)] 下面的代码演示`ResourceAction`自定义声明管理器使用的类。The following code shows the `ResourceAction` class used by the custom claims manager. [!code-csharp[WifClaimsBasedAuthorization#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Misc/wifclaimsbasedauthorization/cs/claimsauthorizationlibrary/resourceaction.cs#1)] 下面的 XML 演示如何配置声明授权管理器在 IIS 7.5 中托管的 web 应用程序上面所示。The following XML shows how to configure the claims authorization manager shown above for a web application hosted in IIS 7.5. 显示仅特定于声明授权管理器的配置元素。Only the elements specific to the configuration of the claims authorization manager are shown. 请注意，对引用类必须添加到在管道``元素。Note that a reference to the class must be added to the pipeline under the `` element. 有关站点和应用程序版本的 IIS 7 之前的 IIS 中承载这些模块可以添加向下管道``元素。For sites and applications hosted in versions of IIS prior to IIS 7 the modules can be added to the pipeline under the `` element. 此配置时显示，但注释掉。This configuration is shown but commented out. 使用声明授权管理器的策略指定由自定义``下的元素[ <claimsAuthorizationManager> ](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/windows-identity-foundation/claimsauthorizationmanager.md)元素。The policy used by the claims authorization manager is specified by custom `` elements under the [<claimsAuthorizationManager>](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/windows-identity-foundation/claimsauthorizationmanager.md) element. 在第一个策略中，主体必须具有一个指定的声明，以对指定资源执行指定的操作。In the first policy, the principal must possess one of the specified claims in order to perform the specified action on the specified resource. 在第二个策略中，主体必须具有两个声明要能够指定资源执行指定的操作。In the second policy, the principal must possess both claims to be able to perform the specified action on the specified resource. 所有其他情况下，主体是自动授予访问权限而不考虑它拥有的声明。In all others, the principal is automatically granted access regardless of the claims it possesses. ```
... ... ... ... ... ...
... ... ... ... ... ... ```

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor() cil managed

summary.span: 初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance bool CheckAccess(class System.Security.Claims.AuthorizationContext context) cil managed
Public Overridable Function CheckAccess (context As AuthorizationContext) As Boolean

param.name: context
param.span: 包含要为其检查身份授权的主题、资源和操作。

span.span: The authorization context that contains the subject, resource, and action for which authorization is to be checked.

summary.span: 在派生类中实现时，检查对指定上下文中的主题的授权，以在指定资源上执行指定操作。

span.span: When implemented in a derived class, checks authorization for the subject in the specified context to perform the specified action on the specified resource.

returns.span: 如果授权该主题在指定的资源上执行指定操作，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the subject is authorized to perform the specified action on the specified resource; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 基实现始终返回`true`，其中授予的访问权限。The base implementation always returns `true`, which authorizes access. 你可以重写此方法在派生类来授予访问权限基于 RP 应用程序的要求。You can override this method in a derived class to authorize access based on the requirements of your RP application. 如果此方法返回`false`，Windows Identity Foundation (WIF) 将未经授权的错误返回到调用方; 否则，将执行传递给 RP 应用程序。If this method returns `false`, Windows Identity Foundation (WIF) returns an unauthorized error to the caller; otherwise, execution is passed to the RP application. ## Examples 在中使用的代码示例主题，将从`Claims Based Authorization`示例。The code examples that are used in the topics are taken from the `Claims Based Authorization` sample. 此示例提供的自定义声明授权管理器，可以授权基于策略在配置中指定的主题。This sample provides a custom claims authorization manager that can authorize subjects based on a policy that is specified in configuration. 自定义声明授权管理器包括三个基本组件： 派生自该类实现管理器中，`ResourceAction`对资源和操作的类和策略读取器读取，并编译为的策略配置文件中指定。The custom claims authorization manager consists of three basic components: a class derived from that implements the manager, the `ResourceAction` class that pairs a resource and an action, and a policy reader that reads and compiles policy that is specified in the configuration file. 此编译的策略可能然后声明授权管理器用于评估来为对资源的访问授权的主体。This compiled policy can then be used by the claims authorization manager to evaluate a principal in order to authorize access to resources. 不是所有元素都均出现由于篇幅所限。Not all elements are shown for the sake of brevity. 有关此示例，并提供其他示例的 WIF 和有关从哪里下载它们，请参阅[WIF 代码示例索引](~/docs/framework/security/wif-code-sample-index.md)。For information about this sample and other samples available for WIF and about where to download them, see [WIF Code Sample Index](~/docs/framework/security/wif-code-sample-index.md). 下面的代码演示的替代方法。The following code shows the override of the method. 此方法授予或拒绝访问基于策略阅读和编译从配置文件。This method grants or denies access based on a policy read and compiled from the configuration file. [!code-csharp[WifClaimsBasedAuthorization#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Misc/wifclaimsbasedauthorization/cs/claimsauthorizationlibrary/myclaimsauthorizationmanager.cs#3)] [!code-csharp[WifClaimsBasedAuthorization#5](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Misc/wifclaimsbasedauthorization/cs/claimsauthorizationlibrary/myclaimsauthorizationmanager.cs#5)] 下面的代码演示`ResourceAction`自定义声明管理器使用的类。The following code shows the `ResourceAction` class used by the custom claims manager. [!code-csharp[WifClaimsBasedAuthorization#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Misc/wifclaimsbasedauthorization/cs/claimsauthorizationlibrary/resourceaction.cs#1)] 使用声明授权管理器的策略指定由自定义``下的元素[ <claimsAuthorizationManager> ](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/windows-identity-foundation/claimsauthorizationmanager.md)元素。The policy used by the claims authorization manager is specified by custom `` elements under the [<claimsAuthorizationManager>](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/windows-identity-foundation/claimsauthorizationmanager.md) element. 读取此策略并将其编译的方法。This policy is read and compiled by the method. 在第一个策略中，主体必须具有一个指定的声明，以对指定资源执行指定的操作。In the first policy, the principal must possess one of the specified claims in order to perform the specified action on the specified resource. 在第二个策略中，主体必须具有两个声明要能够指定资源执行指定的操作。In the second policy, the principal must possess both claims to be able to perform the specified action on the specified resource. 所有其他情况下，主体是自动授予访问权限而不考虑它拥有的声明。In all others, the principal is automatically granted access regardless of the claims it possesses. ``` ... ```

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void LoadCustomConfiguration(class System.Xml.XmlNodeList nodelist) cil managed
Public Overridable Sub LoadCustomConfiguration (nodelist As XmlNodeList)

param.name: nodelist
param.span: 列表中的每个节点都属于 类型。

span.span: Each node in the list is of type .

summary.span: 在派生类中重写时，将从 XML 中加载自定义配置。

span.span: When overridden in a derived class, loads custom configuration from XML.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 配置基础结构调用方法。The method is called by the configuration infrastructure. 当调用此方法时，`nodelist`将包含的顶级子元素[ <claimsAuthorizationManager> ](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/windows-identity-foundation/claimsauthorizationmanager.md)配置文件中的元素。When this method is called, the `nodelist` will contain the top-level child elements of the [<claimsAuthorizationManager>](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/windows-identity-foundation/claimsauthorizationmanager.md) element from the configuration file. 每个元素可能反过来，还包含属性或子元素，具体取决于您为您派生的类定义的配置架构。Each of these elements may, in turn, contain attributes or child elements depending on the configuration schema you define for your derived class. 如果没有子元素出现在``配置文件中的元素，不调用此方法。If no child elements appear under the `` element in the configuration file, this method is not called. 默认实现将引发。The default implementation throws a . 重写此方法在派生类以启用初始化声明授权管理器从配置文件中。Override this method in your derived class to enable initialization of your claims authorization manager from a configuration file. 通常情况下，使用的配置元素来表示授权策略;但是，你可以定义元素，并将其用于任何基于你的应用程序的要求有意义的方式。Typically, the configuration elements are used to express an authorization policy; however, you can define elements and use them in any way that makes sense based on the requirements of your application. ## Examples 在中使用的代码示例主题，将从`Claims Based Authorization`示例。The code examples that are used in the topics are taken from the `Claims Based Authorization` sample. 此示例提供的自定义声明授权管理器，可以授权基于策略在配置中指定的主题。This sample provides a custom claims authorization manager that can authorize subjects based on a policy that is specified in configuration. 自定义声明授权管理器包括三个基本组件： 派生自该类实现管理器中，`ResourceAction`对资源和操作的类和策略读取器读取，并编译为的策略配置文件中指定。The custom claims authorization manager consists of three basic components: a class derived from that implements the manager, the `ResourceAction` class that pairs a resource and an action, and a policy reader that reads and compiles policy that is specified in the configuration file. 此编译的策略可能然后声明授权管理器用于评估来为对资源的访问授权的主体。This compiled policy can then be used by the claims authorization manager to evaluate a principal in order to authorize access to resources. 不是所有元素都均出现由于篇幅所限。Not all elements are shown for the sake of brevity. 有关此示例，并提供其他示例的 WIF 和有关从哪里下载它们，请参阅[WIF 代码示例索引](~/docs/framework/security/wif-code-sample-index.md)。For information about this sample and other samples available for WIF and about where to download them, see [WIF Code Sample Index](~/docs/framework/security/wif-code-sample-index.md). 下面的代码演示的替代方法。The following code shows the override of the method. 此方法使用 （未显示） 的帮助程序策略读取器类以读取和编译配置文件中指定的授权策略。This method uses a helper policy reader class (not shown) to read and compile authorization policies specified in the configuration file. 策略添加到一个字典，并通过访问`ResourceAction`从为其应将它们的资源和操作创建的密钥对象。Policies are added to a dictionary and are accessed by a `ResourceAction` key object that is created from the resource and action for which they are intended. [!code-csharp[WifClaimsBasedAuthorization#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Misc/wifclaimsbasedauthorization/cs/claimsauthorizationlibrary/myclaimsauthorizationmanager.cs#3)] [!code-csharp[WifClaimsBasedAuthorization#4](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Misc/wifclaimsbasedauthorization/cs/claimsauthorizationlibrary/myclaimsauthorizationmanager.cs#4)] 下面的代码演示`ResourceAction`自定义声明管理器使用的类。The following code shows the `ResourceAction` class used by the custom claims manager. [!code-csharp[WifClaimsBasedAuthorization#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Misc/wifclaimsbasedauthorization/cs/claimsauthorizationlibrary/resourceaction.cs#1)] 使用声明授权管理器的策略指定由自定义``下的元素[ <claimsAuthorizationManager> ](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/windows-identity-foundation/claimsauthorizationmanager.md)元素。The policy used by the claims authorization manager is specified by custom `` elements under the [<claimsAuthorizationManager>](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/windows-identity-foundation/claimsauthorizationmanager.md) element. 读取此策略并将其编译的方法。This policy is read and compiled by the method. 在第一个策略中，主体必须具有一个指定的声明，以对指定资源执行指定的操作。In the first policy, the principal must possess one of the specified claims in order to perform the specified action on the specified resource. 在第二个策略中，主体必须具有两个声明要能够指定资源执行指定的操作。In the second policy, the principal must possess both claims to be able to perform the specified action on the specified resource. 所有其他情况下，主体是自动授予访问权限而不考虑它拥有的声明。In all others, the principal is automatically granted access regardless of the claims it possesses. ``` ... ```
